data.title: SOCIETY OF JESUS TRUST OF 1929 FOR ROMAN CATHOLIC PURPOSES
data.meta_description: SOCIETY OF JESUS TRUST OF 1929 FOR ROMAN CATHOLIC PURPOSES is a charity that was founded in 1963 wit...
data.text:
PARISH MINISTRY: in parishes & in university chaplaincies SPIRITUALITY: centres, programmes & publications for spiritual education EDUCATION: schools, colleges of higher educationFORMATION: for Jesuits & Catholic clergySOCIAL JUSTICE & RELIEF OF POVERTY: Jesuit Refugee Service & service to the poorCARE OF INFIRM & ELDERLY JESUITS JESUIT WORK OVERSEAS

Governing document

UV 242 PAGE 331 (TRUST DEED DATED 20 MARCH 1929), ORDER OF THE CHARITY COMMISSIONERS DATED 5 MAY 2005 AS AMENDED ON 07 SEPTEMBER 2021

Charitable objects

FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES CONDUCIVE TO THE ADVANCEMENT OR MAINTENANCE OF THE ROMAN CATHOLIC RELIGION IN GREAT BRITAIN (PARTICULARLY IN CONNECTION THEREWITH BY THE PROVISION OF BUILDINGS SERVICE RELIEF OF POVERTY AND ADVANCEMENT OF EDUCATION) AND FOR THE MAINTENANCE AND ADVANCEMENT OF THE ROMAN CATHOLIC RELIGION IN MISSIONARY COUNTRIES OUTSIDE EUROPE.

Area of benefit

NOT DEFINED.
